DOC.detailed_description: Asthma long-term lung disease affect 22 million people United States . Symptoms include wheeze , chest tightness , shortness breath , cough . Inhaled corticosteroid common medication use treat asthma . NHLBI establish guideline doctor reference treat people asthma . Study researcher previously evaluate distance learn program aim educate doctor NHLBI guideline improve pediatrician adherence guideline recommendation use daily inhaled corticosteroid persistent asthma pediatric patient . This pilot study evaluate new version distance learn program . By use distance learn program rather traditional face-to-face educational program , participant able complete program schedule , flexibility may result increased interest program . The purpose study evaluate effectiveness new distance learn program changing pediatrician ' behavior , attitude , knowledge regard NHLBI guideline use inhaled corticosteroid treat pediatric patient asthma . This study enroll pediatrician . Participants randomly assign either distance learn group control group . At baseline , participant complete questionnaire . Participants control group take part educational activity . Participants distance learn group take part 1-hour Webinar , teleconference , provide orientation program discus importance NHLBI guideline . At time first Webinar 6-week follow-up Webinar , participant log study Web site complete training module aim educate participant common barrier prescribe daily inhale corticosteroid . As alternative Web site , participant may choose view training module CD-ROM . Six week first Webinar , participant take part follow-up Webinar . At time , study researcher answer participant ' question provide program review . The Web site study material remain available participant distance learn group 6 month follow-up Webinar ; list serve also make available participant . At 1 6 month follow-up Webinar , participant complete questionnaire .
